subject: Football
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Andre Brown ruptured his Achilles’ tendon in 2009 and was waived by five teams, but with the injury to Giants’ starting tailback Ahmad Bradshaw, Brown finally has a chance to rush in the N.F.L.
